body: A magician can use performance to manipulate magical energies. Allies of the magician gain a +1 bonus on caster level checks, concentration checks, and attack rolls with spells and spell-like abilities. This bonus increases by +1 at 5th level and every six levels thereafter. This ability relies on visual and audible components. It replaces inspire courage.
name: Dweomercraft
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Magician/Bardic Performance/Dweomercraft
